name: Weather Week

screenshots.caption: Autocomplete input places to get Weather Forecasts
Get Weather Forecasts from Latitude and Longitude

summary: An add-on for Firefox to get forecast with HTML5 Geolocation
short_description: Get weather forecasts for week quickly with this handy widget dedicated to the Firefox browser. You can get the weather of your city is through a useful input autocomplete, and through the API for HTML5 geolocation. You can set the parameters for the latitude and longitude, then choose the color of the bars that describe the temperature
